item.title: My edgeville wc script w banker
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

i see one thing wrong:

[scar]begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
findwillow;
wait(1000+random(1000));
cutniggacut;
until(false)
findbank;
wait(1000+random(1000));
bankem;
end.[/scar]

This will cut over and over again and never bank, since until is set to false. if u put hte intul right above the end., then the script will work. but dont use this script in runescape. its HIGHLY detectable (movemousesmooth and other things…)

but good job for ur first script!

Read full topic
item.source: My edgeville wc script w banker

item.title: My edgeville wc script w banker
item.dc:creator: @IheartMaryJane IheartMaryJane
item.description:
@IheartMaryJane wrote:

this is my first script please post helpful advice, compliments to bullzeye for all his help

[scar]program edgeywillowcutter;
var x,y,cut,bank:integer;
const
tree1=3752249;
tree2=2175025;
tree3=3764579;
Bankbooth=9211540; //this is the glass part of the booth
Log1=2183514;
Log2=2184538;
//minimap colors
Banklogo=54276151;
plant=3762498; //the plant nearest the tree

procedure cutniggacut;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,tree1,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(1000+random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(cut,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure findwillow;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,plant,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;
procedure findbank;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,banklogo,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure bankem;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,bankbooth,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
Begin;
cut:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DA3330A03E70357735’ +
‘7771452649D5656861E86C60E0E2EAE2E462062189D26500D205D’ +
‘10B01C86C5C7A813600CD87E825D58F03A2D709A8171C26F87D47’ +
‘5DBD1080192310332124A92620C7F56000008E0E9D74’);

bank:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DAC592410E0321084’ +
‘5AF044CA3CE56FDDCFF4855999936B69AA62E0612167E1FC12F44’ +
‘AB91917D7656FF506346428A094C3547AAB090F0EF2A14115A541’ +
‘DB0659E17CBA153B5752E2C879A5F591DCC3C63DD8C85C7067FB1’ +
‘E90EF6D30D0B53CDB177FFBB1F7CF0704FEC8EF5B9283D4F64972’ +
‘0FB7CD3ACFF519BB7C2F5A52D693D9E7DDBA5B0’);
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
findwillow;
wait(1000+random(1000));
cutniggacut;
until(false)
findbank;
wait(1000+random(1000));
bankem;
end.[/scar]
